abstract: Stars of movie Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice attend premiere at Radio City Music Hall.

headline.main: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill and Amy Adams at ‘Batman v Superman’ Party

snippet: Stars of the latest superhero blockbuster attend a Gotham-themed party and premiere at Radio City Music Hall.
lead_paragraph: Stars of the latest superhero blockbuster attend a Gotham-themed party and premiere at Radio City Music Hall.
